items.title: It‚Äôs officially SUPERBOWL WEEKEND
items.content_html:
@walt_cafe

It‚Äôs officially SUPERBOWL WEEKEND! Are you a Mahomes or Brady fan?!? Let‚Äôs get heated in the comment sections about who will win this Sunday. One thing we can all agree on is that our English Muffin Breakfast Sammie is a winner every time. We‚Äôre now offering different flavors of our Housemade English Muffins: plain, whole wheat, cinnamon raisin, and gluten-free! . Today is also the last day to order our Super Bowl Package. Make this weekend an easy (but still memorable) one with this dinner package: - Buffalo Chicken Dip with Housemade Chicken n‚Äô Biscuit Crackers - 24 Carrot Hummus with Za‚Äôatar Crusted Pita Chips - Korean Chicken Wings with Gochujang BBQ glaze, Sesame Seeds, Kimchee Ranch - 8 Corner Pizza (cheese or pepperoni, XL version of our regular pizza) - 3 Dick Murphy Lite Crowlers . Email meg@waltandwhitmanbrewing.com to order! . WALT CAFE: ‚≠êÔ∏èOpen until 12pm today ‚≠êÔ∏è Online ordering, delivery and pickup available ‚≠êÔ∏è Call us at 518-682-3602 . GAME ON üèàüèü #superbowlweekend #superbowl #mahomes #mahomesmagic #tombrady #tombradygoat #fridayvibes #foodiesofinstagram #englishmuffins #englishmuffinsandwich #saratogasprings #saratogaspringsny #saratogaracetrack

items.title: Picture this
items.content_html:
@walt_cafe

Picture this... you had a long week. You‚Äôre work schedule was packed with Zoom calls. You had to shovel your driveway only for it to snow again. You watched too much news and doomscrolled for too long. But now it‚Äôs FINALLY the weekend. Treat yourself for making it through a long week with a Walt Tart. YOU DESERVE IT! . CAFE INFO: ‚≠êÔ∏è Open until 1pm today ‚≠êÔ∏è Available for online ordering, delivery and pickup (no dine-in at this time) ‚≠êÔ∏è CALL US AT 518-682-3602 #poptarts #breakfastideas #breakfastideas #morningmotivation #morningcoffee #saratogasprings #saratogacounty #saratogaspringsny #saturdayvibes #saturdaymorning #saturdaymood #food #foodporn #foodie #foodstagram #foodblogger

items.title: üò§BATTLE OF THE BREAKFAST SANDWICHES üò§Kick off yo‚Ä¶
items.content_html:
@walt_cafe

üò§BATTLE OF THE BREAKFAST SANDWICHES üò§Kick off your Super Bowl Sunday with a little competition... who will come out on top- üèàThe classic breakfast sandwich that consistently is a favorite. The BACON egg and cheese (Tom Brady & The Buccaneers) üèà The breakfast sandwich with a little kick.. The SAUSAGE egg and cheese (Patrick Mahomes & The Chiefs) . üèÜWho will win? Order both sammie and decide for yourself. Then comment your winner!!! . . . REMEMBER online and call-in orders only today!! Link in bio. . . . #superbowl #superbowl2021 #superbowlsunday #breakfastofchampions #battleofthebreakfast

items.title: BIG NEWS
items.content_html:
@walt_cafe

BIG NEWS! Walt and Whitman Brewing has been nominated by USA Today Readers Choice top new brewery for 2021! We are so appreciative to be a finalist alongside other breweries from all across the country. It is all thanks to our extraordinary community--our day 1 customers and familiar faces to new friends and walker-bys. We have each of you to thank. We are so excited to be representing Saratoga, our home and where so much of our inspiration comes from. Lets show up and show out, Saratoga style, please support by voting (link in bio). Also- you can vote EVERYDAY until March 16th!! Set your alarms daily to get that vote in. Lets show the country how supportive Saratoga is :)

items.title: WE GOT OPTIONS
items.content_html:
@walt_cafe

WE GOT OPTIONS. Dine in or to go. Order here or online. Grab a sandwich with sausage, bacon, or a vegetarian patty (üî•üî•üî•). Mix and match on English muffins (plain, whole-wheat, gluten-free, cinnamon-raisin). So many good choices you can make today! Choice @walt_cafe for a day best enjoyed ‚ù§Ô∏èü•∞! CAFE HOURS: **dine in** Wednesday-Sunday: 8-2pm BREWERY HOURS **to go only** Thursday-Saturday: 4-8pm Sunday: 12-5pm

items.title: So - we will be closed for service this week
items.content_html:
@flatbread.social

So - we will be closed for service this week. We have too many people quarantined for potential exposure to run the restaurants smoothly. As a result, we are taking the week off. Here are some pictures of our staff that we are trying to keep safe and healthy. Hope to see you next week! #effcovid @henrysttaproom
